data.text: @CBSSacramento Kids we're never the problem, school union's we're the problem.
@s_chekov @CBSSacramento My suggestion is for all criminals and drug addicts to move to San Francisco and Los Angeles.
@MarkBo19 @CBSSacramento @GavinNewsom The blue print is how the spend more of the tax surplus with student safety as an excuse.

@CBSSacramento Ask a teacher if masks work. The answer is yes. Covid is not spreading in schools because masks work. Do we like wearing them? No. But everyone keeps their coughs and sneezes to themself.

@bestmoveon @tom_hogue_sr @CBSSacramento Shut up with that "then move" bullshit because you didn't bother moving out of the country the four years Trump was in office and you were crying everyday about his mean tweets.

@CBSSacramento No blueprint needed. Schools are and have been open. Now, lose the masks. ALL DONE! Just saved the state of #California millions of dollars, wasted time and having to listen to @GavinNewsom do a press conference. #hypocrite  Worst #Governor ever!!!
@CBSSacramento The students have always been safe. Itâ€™s been about the fears of adults. Masks are the problem.
@CBSSacramento How about keep students safe by keeping criminals locked up?
@CBSSacramento Take the masks off. There has never been any science to justify making kids masks or forcing Covid vaccine on them.
